snippet: The Cubs moved two games behind the Pirates, turning a 4-3 deficit into a 9-4 lead with the fifth-inning outburst.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Chicago Cubs beat Pittsburgh Pirates, 9-6; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Cubs moved two games behind the Pirates, turning a 4-3 deficit into a 9-4 lead with the fifth-inning outburst.

headline.print_headline: Cubs Defeat Pirates, Moving Closer to Top N.L. Wild-Card Spot
headline.main: Cubs Defeat Pirates, Moving Closer to Top N.L. Wild-Card Spot
